title: TikTok's Global Carbon Footprint Nearly Exceeds Greece's, Study Finds
content: TikTok's heavy reliance on video streaming has made it one of the more energy-intensive platforms, contributing to a substantial carbon footprint.
summary: TikTok's heavy reliance on video streaming has made it one of the more energy-intensive platforms, contributing to a substantial carbon footprint.

title: Putin Aide And Key Russian Missile Developer Found Dead Near Moscow
content: His death, reportedly carried out by an unknown assassin, has drawn attention due to his involvement in the military-industrial complex supporting Russia's aggression in Ukraine.

title: NASA Reveals Why Its Ingenuity Helicopter Crashed On Mars
content: Ingenuity was designed to perform up to five experimental test flights over 30 days but managed to operate for almost three years, performing 72 flights.
summary: Ingenuity was designed to perform up to five experimental test flights over 30 days but managed to operate for almost three years, performing 72 flights.

title: Foul-Mouthed AI Bot Takes Customer Service Training To A New Level
content: Artificial Intelligence is being used for a novel purpose: training customer service staff to handle irate customers through an AI-powered, foul-mouthed robot.
summary: Artificial Intelligence is being used for a novel purpose: training customer service staff to handle irate customers through an AI-powered, foul-mouthed robot.

title: Millions Of Stanley Cups Recalled In US Over Burn Risk
content: Fashionable US drinkware brand Stanley on Thursday recalled 2.6 million travel mugs after faulty lids were found to pose a risk of burning users with hot liquid.
summary: Fashionable US drinkware brand Stanley on Thursday recalled 2.6 million travel mugs after faulty lids were found to pose a risk of burning users with hot liquid.

title: Watch: Inmates Shout "Free Luigi" In Wild TV Interview, Video Goes Viral
content: In the video that has since gone viral on social media, the inmates could be heard yelling out, "Luigi's conditions suck" and "Free Luigi".

title: What's Ghost Gun, Used To Kill UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson
content: Luigi Mangione apparently used a ghost gun, a firearm that can be made at home, to shoot down the UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, police said.
summary: Luigi Mangione apparently used a ghost gun, a firearm that can be made at home, to shoot down the UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, police said.

title: Months Before Killing UnitedHealthcare CEO, Luigi Mangione Went On Solo Trip
content: Luigi Mangione, the man charged with killing UnitedHealthcare CEO, reportedly fled his day-to-day life in Hawaii to "zen out" on a long solo trip to Asia before returning and gunning down Brian Thompson.
summary: Luigi Mangione, the man charged with killing UnitedHealthcare CEO, reportedly fled his day-to-day life in Hawaii to "zen out" on a long solo trip to Asia before returning and gunning down Brian Thompson.

title: "Couldn't Afford A Second Suit...": Elon Musk's Mother On Throwback Photo

title: Undercover FBI Agents Had No Role In US Capitol Attack: Report
content: Undercover FBI agents were not present during the 2021 attack on the US Capitol by Donald Trump supporters, a Justice Department watchdog said Thursday in a report debunking a popular right-wing conspiracy theory.
summary: Undercover FBI agents were not present during the 2021 attack on the US Capitol by Donald Trump supporters, a Justice Department watchdog said Thursday in a report debunking a popular right-wing conspiracy theory.

title: "In Its Own Interest": S Jaishankar Says Bangladesh Must Protect Minorities
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Monday said the ruling dispensation of Bangladesh is expected to ensure the safety of minorities.

title: Syrian Rebels Vow To Search For Missing US Journalist Austin Tice
content: Syria's new leadership said Thursday it was searching for missing US journalist Austin Tice and had secured the release of another American it said had been held by the ousted government.
summary: Syria's new leadership said Thursday it was searching for missing US journalist Austin Tice and had secured the release of another American it said had been held by the ousted government.

title: Two Airplane-Sized Asteroids Flying Past Earth At Alarming Speed Today
content: Space enthusiasts are in for a major cosmic event on Friday as NASA said that two aeroplane-sized asteroids -- 2024 XW15 and 2024 XC16 -- are all set to fly past Earth.
summary: Space enthusiasts are in for a major cosmic event on Friday as NASA said that two aeroplane-sized asteroids -- 2024 XW15 and 2024 XC16 -- are all set to fly past Earth.

title: Amazon Donates $1 Million To Donald Trump's Inaugural Fund
content: Amazon is donating $1 million to US President-elect Donald Trump's inaugural fund and the company will air the event on its Prime Video service, an Amazon spokesperson said on Thursday.
summary: Amazon is donating $1 million to US President-elect Donald Trump's inaugural fund and the company will air the event on its Prime Video service, an Amazon spokesperson said on Thursday.

title: US Couple, On A Holiday In Mexico, Shot Dead
content: A US couple was shot dead in the violence-plagued western Mexican state of Michoacan, state prosecutors said on Thursday, just after the country's president had wrapped up a meeting with security officials aimed at addressing a wave of violence.
summary: A US couple was shot dead in the violence-plagued western Mexican state of Michoacan, state prosecutors said on Thursday, just after the country's president had wrapped up a meeting with security officials aimed at addressing a wave of violence.

title: Significant Improvement For Indians In Green Card Queue For January 2025

title: US Woman, 70, Accused Of Running Illegal Dental Clinic From Her Kitchen
content: A woman seeking a single tooth extraction on July 26 at the makeshift clinic, located in a kitchen, was allegedly told she needed five teeth removed due to decay.
summary: A woman seeking a single tooth extraction on July 26 at the makeshift clinic, located in a kitchen, was allegedly told she needed five teeth removed due to decay.

title: Baba Vanga's 2025 Predictions: 'War In The East Will Destroy The West'
content: Baba Vanga's 2025 predictions include a catastrophic war between the East and West, alien contact leading to a potential crisis, advancements in telepathy and nanotechnology, and significant scientific breakthroughs.
